Row.Text: +2 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production per Age on [icon:MILITARY] Military Buildings.
+10 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production per Age in [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities while at war.
+1 [icon:YIELD_PRODUCTION] Production on [icon:SPECIALIST] Specialists, or +2 if you have 3 or fewer [icon:YIELD_CITIES] Cities.
+1 [icon:NAR_REW_COMBAT] Combat Strength for Infantry Units. Repeatable.
